question_text: Select two steps commonly involved in pairing a Bluetooth speaker with a mobile device.
answer_options: Enable NFC pairing on both devices
Turn on the speaker and activate pairing mode
Search for available Bluetooth devices on the mobile phone
Assign an IP address manually to the speaker
correct_answer: Turn on the speaker and activate pairing mode
Search for available Bluetooth devices on the mobile phone
explanation: Bluetooth pairing involves making one device discoverable and scanning for it from the other. IP addressing is not required for Bluetooth.
